member.name: T:TanvirArjel.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection.IScopedService
member.summary: The services implemented this interface will automatically be registered with scoped life time in ASP.NET Core Dependency Injection Container.

member.name: T:TanvirArjel.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection.ScopedServiceAttribute
member.summary: The services containing this Attribute will automatically be registered with scoped life time in ASP.NET Core Dependency Injection Container.

member.name: T:TanvirArjel.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Contains all the extension methods for dynamic service registration.

member.summary: This extension method is used to register the types implementing any of the , and interfaces.
member.param: Assembly name starts with any of the provided strings will only be scanned.

member.summary: This extension method is used to register the types containing any of the , and attributes.
